Detailed Description

16 bit relative representation of a collection of coordinates.

void GfxCoordinates16::addCoordinate (  int32  lat,
int32  lon
)  [inline, virtual]
 

Add new coordinates without specifying the previous ones.

O(n) complexity, so avoid usage! Use with care! Rather use the other version of addCoordinate().

Parameters:
lat Latitude to add.
lon Longitude to add.

Implements GfxCoordinates.

void GfxCoordinates16::addCoordinate (  int32  lat,
int32  lon,
int32  prevlat,
int32  prevLon
)  [inline, virtual]
 

Add new coordinates.

O(1) complexity. Prefer this method to addCoordinate( int32 lat, int32 lon ).

Parameters:
lat Latitude to add.
lon Longitude to add.
prevLat Previous latitude. Ignored if no previous coordinates exist.
prevLon Previous longitude. Ignored if no previous coordinates exist.

Implements GfxCoordinates.

int32 GfxCoordinates16::getLat (  uint32  i  )  const [inline, virtual]
 

Get the i:th latitude without specifying the previous latitude.

O(i) complexity, so use with care! Use with care! Rather use getLat( uint32 i, int32 prevLat ) if possible.

Parameters:
i Coordinate number to get.
Returns:
The latitude.
